#summary How to install this plugin ?.
#labels Featured

= Installation =

grails install-plugin http://dbdeploy4grails.googlecode.com/files/grails-dbdeploy-0.1.zip

= Configuration =
  All configurations are controlled from  *grails-app/conf/DbdeployConfig.groovy*

== Properties ==
  _output.consolidatedScriptFle_

  _output.consolidatedUndoScriptFle_

  _dbdeploy.sqlFolder_

  _dbdeploy.dbType_
